background.positive:

Make sure the subject is fully visible.
Turn background solid warm gray color.
Keep exactly the same design, pose, proportions, materials, texture, and COLORS as in the original image.
Do not change color, brightness, contrast, saturation, hue, white balance, or lighting direction on the subject.
